name: Super Gilli Danda (Epiphany Dev Game Jam)
name_original: Super Gilli Danda (Epiphany Dev Game Jam)
description:
A local Sport of Pakistan and India (Gilli Danda) that is brought to the Grand Stage

How To Play:  Try to hit the gilli as far as possible to gain maximum score in without missing for 3 turns and getting caught. Try To make it into the leaderboard
